title: Gifting Error
body:
When trying to send a gift I get an error message.

You are unable to send this gift for one of the following reasons:
* "ERROR_CREATING_FFG_ACCOUNT_NICKNAME"

Any reason behind this. Would really like to send this gift.

replies.body:
Hey DoctorDusk,

Is the person you're trying to gift someone you just recently friended? You need to be friends for 24 hours in order to gift to someone.

I've friends with them for about month now.
They removed me (possibly by mistake) then re-added me a couple hours later.
I guess I'll have to wait for the timer to finish. 
Thanks for the response!
